capabilities.capability: This transformation allows IAP users to generate a random integer within a provided range (inclusive of both min and max)

entryPoint.name: Generate Random Integer Within Range - IAP

inputs.name: minimum
inputs.description: Lower bound (inclusive) for the range between which a random integer will be generated

inputs.name: maximum
inputs.description: Upper bound (inclusive) for the range between which a random integer will be generated

name: Generate Random Integer Within Range - IAP
overview: Generate a random integer within a range
webName: Generate Random Integer Within Range - IAP
